1.quote: Many, are so concerned for the future, that they forget the present - from which everything is defined.
1.author: artemiou

2.quote: Finding a reason to die, is easier than finding a reason to live.
2.author: artemiou

3.quote: The only reason we are alive, is the reason itself.
3.author: artemiou

4.quote: When one is young, lives in bravery* but when old, lives in fear.
4.author: artemiou

5.quote: Fame, is a reward to be given not a target to be claimed.
5.author: artemiou

6.quote: Life, is like an orchestra. You are the maestro and everyone else the singers.
6.author: artemiou

7.quote: Inside a book, one can hide a universe of knowledge.
7.author: artemiou

8.quote: A serious problem that occurs in the last generations, is that the older expect from the younger to be ethical, when they teach them - through actions - corruption.
8.author: artemiou

9.quote: Love, is stronger than death. Even the ones who forget in their mind, never forget in their heart.
9.author: artemiou

10.quote: One, can never know who he really is* but only choose, what to become.
10.author: artemiou

11.quote: My passion, is to be a man of many talents. I never chose it for me, but for my world to be a better place for everyone.
11.author: artemiou

12.quote: Love falls like lightning, enchanting the eyes of the heart with its dazzling radiance.
12.author: artemiou

13.quote: Our brain is a receiver, of universal knowledge.
13.author: artemiou

14.quote: Do not follow the path of loneliness* unless you are determined to die, for something higher than yourself.
14.author: artemiou

15.quote: If you wish people to see, what you see of the cosmos* do not listen to them. Show them, inspire them, and recreate the future of everyone, into a bright one.
15.author: artemiou

16.quote: This world is not ours. We are just wanderers of the universe, in search of a celestial home.
16.author: artemiou

17.quote: The arrow of time takes multiple forms, reaching everyone in its scope.
17.author: artemiou

18.quote: Your life can not be continuous* unless it is connected to a value greater than you.
18.author: artemiou

19.quote: What keeps as alive, is also what kills us* if we do not follow it.
19.author: artemiou

20.quote: Many people in life, will intentionally try to make you feel bad about yourself. But the only reason they choose you, is to remind you that you are unique.
20.author: artemiou

21.quote: Most people, trade their lives for temporary happiness. Only a few accept death, in exchange for eternal happiness.
21.author: artemiou

22.quote: When they are silent* speak up. When they speak up* think. When they think* act.
22.author: artemiou

23.quote: True friends, are there for you. The rest of them, are there for themselves.
23.author: artemiou

24.quote: Society, has lost its morality, because school and family, have abandoned their role of raising humans
24.author: artemiou

25.quote: The place of one's first creation, will always remain indelible in his heart.
25.author: artemiou

26.quote: Find people who understand your pain and are willing to share theirs, with you.
26.author: artemiou

27.quote: Those who do great deeds, are not geniuses* but people who feel a supreme duty, to rebuild a better world.
27.author: artemiou

28.quote: To raise a child successfully, you must first become a child again.
28.author: artemiou

29.quote: Do something new each day. Otherwise, it will seem impossible to live.
29.author: artemiou

30.quote: To innovate in life, you must love to think.
30.author: artemiou

31.quote: Many people, condemn themselves into living badly* casting their mistakes as charges, in the structure of life.
31.author: artemiou

32.quote: Fighting the urge, is better than resisting it.
32.author: artemiou

33.quote: Virtue is given to all, but only the humble fully unlock it.
33.author: artemiou

34.quote: Many people say they know me, but they do not. They only see, what I choose to show them.
34.author: artemiou

36.quote: Never neglect your daily duties. They build your inner strength.
36.author: artemiou

37.quote: Concentration, is a decreasing function. To increase it, differentiate it into vertices.
37.author: artemiou

38.quote: The stronger the connections, the better the structure.
38.author: artemiou

39.quote: Never define your work. Let your work, define you.
39.author: artemiou

41.quote: Those who build the foundations of human knowledge* suffer daily from their ideas.
41.author: artemiou

42.quote: The use of recognition, is about sharing ideas for a better world.
42.author: artemiou

43.quote: Eternal freedom, leads to corruption. No freedom, leads to war. True freedom, lies in between.
43.author: artemiou

44.quote: People rarely forgive* because selfishness, avoids being exposed to the beauty of kindness.
44.author: artemiou

45.quote: For every limit we cross, we must set a new one.
45.author: artemiou

46.quote: Rules, are not there to be broken. They exist, to teach discipline and morality. And when the time comes, they are replaced by others.
46.author: artemiou

47.quote: The essence of 'absolute' truth varies* as each mind generates a different sequence of interpretations.
47.author: artemiou

48.quote: What we now regard as the norm, was once a figment of imagination.
48.author: artemiou

49.quote: Numerous, - seemingly - unrelated events, occur in our world. However, the probabilistic ascertainment of their interconnection, becomes exponentially cheaper* due to the multi-parametric form of the 'randomness' equation.
49.author: artemiou

50.quote: People - usually - unconsciously, transform their behavior* when they are surrounded by other people.
50.author: artemiou

51.quote: Motivation, is unnecessary for someone to start something* but it is vital, for someone who wants to complete something.
51.author: artemiou

52.quote: The cosmic laws that govern everything, must not break down. We must co-create with them* and never against them.
52.author: artemiou

53.quote: Every problem, can be solved through geometry. For they are parts of a bigger picture* a global puzzle.
53.author: artemiou

54.quote: Visualization, is the starting point of creation.
54.author: artemiou

55.quote: Every human being, is a sequence of numbers* generating beautiful patterns.
55.author: artemiou

56.quote: Secrets, create doubts. Doubts, create distance. Distance, creates emotional collapse. Emotional exhaustion, wears down relationships.
56.author: artemiou

57.quote: Man, needs religion. Otherwise, he willfully blinds himself, mentally.
57.author: artemiou

58.quote: Religion, connects to the divine* the invisible* the powerful* the fascinating* the unimaginable.
58.author: artemiou

59.quote: The path of death, can lead only to itself* or to glory.
59.author: artemiou

60.quote: The probabilistic outcome for one's life, is the rarest in this world.
60.author: artemiou

61.quote: Friendship, is a relationship of mutual love.
61.author: artemiou

62.quote: Music, speaks to one's soul, like ideas speak to the mind.
62.author: artemiou

63.quote: If one does not have ideas, it is because he has not tried yet.
63.author: artemiou

64.quote: Monotony, is the enemy of satisfaction.
64.author: artemiou

65.quote: Whatever rule a society has established* is forgotten, in the moment of war.
65.author: artemiou

66.quote: Most people, believe in luck. Few, believe in act.
66.author: artemiou

67.quote: Everyone, is a child prodigy* and deserves to be honored for his uniqueness.
67.author: artemiou

68.quote: If you do not recognize your fears* you will never recognize your strengths.
68.author: artemiou

69.quote: Perhaps, what we call as imagination* is just a memory, lost in the abyss of time.
69.author: artemiou

70.quote: A true creator, never destroys what he made.
70.author: artemiou

71.quote: Those who talk a lot, are either afraid or have self-doubt.
71.author: artemiou

72.quote: We do not look for justice* we make it.
72.author: artemiou

73.quote: Work today, to secure tomorrow* because time is constant, but fate is mutable.
73.author: artemiou

74.quote: Artificial intelligence, is a glimpse into the vastness of the human mind.
74.author: artemiou

75.quote: Every moment we do not take advantage of, is a lost life.
75.author: artemiou

76.quote: Most people, sacrifice eternity, for a pleasurable life. Only a few sacrifice pleasure, for an eternal life.
76.author: artemiou

77.quote: What we now consider logical, was once considered irrational.
77.author: artemiou

78.quote: A sense of emptiness, will always fill the void.
78.author: artemiou

80.quote: Your destiny, is where the heart, is in harmony with the mind.
80.author: artemiou

81.quote: What amazes me about numbers, is their universal truth.
81.author: artemiou

82.quote: A man of knowledge, never opposes the truth* he either embraces it, or perfects it.
82.author: artemiou

83.quote: It does not matter if you believe your claim is right. What matters is, if your heart and mind are bright enough, to see the light.
83.author: artemiou

84.quote: Without a source, no problem can be solved.
84.author: artemiou

85.quote: Knowledge, is won with a pencil* whereas freedom, with a sword.
85.author: artemiou

86.quote: Every man, needs an ideal. If there is none, then he is destined to create his own.
86.author: artemiou

87.quote: What you see, will fade away* but what you feel and do, will remain.
87.author: artemiou

88.quote: A gift means nothing, unless it is given through the soul.
88.author: artemiou

89.quote: Human will, is the strongest building block of the world.
89.author: artemiou

90.quote: The most beautiful formations, are the result of the simplest interventions.
90.author: artemiou

91.quote: It is not the world that is complex, but the mind that processes accordingly.
91.author: artemiou

92.quote: Everything works in motion, manifesting a divine essence.
92.author: artemiou

93.quote: The sands of time, hide one's footsteps* unless they are carved by pain.
93.author: artemiou

94.quote: What is science? Observation* experimentation* creation.
94.author: artemiou

95.quote: The true face is seen, only when life is tested.
95.author: artemiou

96.quote: Life's decisions, are like the branches of a tree. As you climb towards the top, they taper off sharply* revealing an eerie complexity - that nevertheless beautifies the appearance of the tree's structure.
96.author: artemiou

97.quote: He who does not dare to dream, does not achieve anything worthy of the world's attention.
97.author: artemiou

98.quote: You are the most uniquely beautiful person, you will ever meet. So, love and embrace what makes you the best.
98.author: artemiou

99.quote: The worst thing, man can do to science* is to deify it.
99.author: artemiou

100.quote: Generalized knowledge, is a gateway to a multitude of inaccessible mental paths. For, it is a generative power of intellectual processes, such as that of imagination, observation, thought and especially freedom.
100.author: artemiou

101.quote: Unworthy, is he who can, but does not do what his soul testifies to.
101.author: artemiou

102.quote: The microcosm, is much more impressive than its superset.
102.author: artemiou

103.quote: We attract, what we are. We are, what we choose.
103.author: artemiou

104.quote: The strongest structure in the world, is triangular. The assumption, is mathematical* but the cause is divine.
104.author: artemiou

105.quote: The reason of existence, is the cause of immortality or death.
105.author: artemiou

106.quote: The hourglass, represents much more than the passage of time. Many of them, are expressed by the convergence of concepts to a single reference point and their divergence from it.
106.author: artemiou

107.quote: The reason behind hatred, is either jealousy or pain.
107.author: artemiou

108.quote: Mathematics, created the path, which no science could see.
108.author: artemiou

109.quote: Behind the cliffs of belief, lie the plain of hope.
109.author: artemiou

110.quote: Like many things, parenting is a skill to be learned* not a fact to be taken for granted.
110.author: artemiou

111.quote: Habits, remind us of who we choose to be, every day of our lives.
111.author: artemiou

112.quote: Ideas, are the product of deep neural connections and a divine core of knowledge.
112.author: artemiou

113.quote: The habit of 'why', creates the tendency of 'how'.
113.author: artemiou

114.quote: Solve the problems you already have. Never add to them.
114.author: artemiou

115.quote: One who willingly sacrifices his life, to give it to another, is called 'parent'.
115.author: artemiou

116.quote: Changing a habit, is equivalent to changing yourself.
116.author: artemiou

119.quote: Every question we ask, every answer we give* either revolves around the graph of ideas, or extends it.
119.author: artemiou

120.quote: A good book, describes life under its own prism* through the mind of the author and the heart of th reader.
120.author: artemiou

121.quote: Sometimes, retreat is necessary, whether it is purposeful or not.
121.author: artemiou

122.quote: The eyes, can sometimes give you, the wrong perception of things.
122.author: artemiou

123.quote: Hetero-criticism, is a waste of time* while self-criticism, is an investment.
123.author: artemiou

124.quote: Education, has many problems. One of them, is the inability to spread knowledge and imagination, to students.
124.author: artemiou

125.quote: A corrupt education, can destroy an entire generation.
125.author: artemiou

126.quote: Love the unknown, as it ignites curiosity about the known.
126.author: artemiou

127.quote: To build yourself, you must understand him.
127.author: artemiou

128.quote: We are the descendants, of an intergalactic civilization.
128.author: artemiou

129.quote: Human selfishness, is gigantic and can be moderated, through universal knowledge.
129.author: artemiou

130.quote: As humans wish to expand cosmically, then perhaps the same happened in the past* with another distant civilization.
130.author: artemiou

132.quote: We live in an era, where the radical revision of long-held beliefs about our history, is deemed necessary.
132.author: artemiou

133.quote: We must learn from history and judge it rationally* not just passively reproduce it.
133.author: artemiou

134.quote: Knowledge, is a network of ideas. Depending on the mental path you choose, you can also find the corresponding set of ideas, that govern it.
134.author: artemiou

136.quote: Our body, contains information about our true origin and our final destination.
136.author: artemiou

137.quote: Information overload, is one of the mightiest enemies of learning.
137.author: artemiou

138.quote: Modern society's expectations for learning, exceed the mental tools provided for it.
138.author: artemiou

139.quote: By flipping the right switch, you can turn on an entire world.
139.author: artemiou

140.quote: Exercise your body, as if you were to die tomorrow. Enrich your mind, as if you were to live forever.
140.author: artemiou

141.quote: Almost everything around us, is finite* except human will.
141.author: artemiou

142.quote: In order to rise, one must first fall.
142.author: artemiou

143.quote: In matters of politics, only the reasonable people have jurisdiction. Otherwise, a worthy leader or the strongest takes over.
143.author: artemiou

144.quote: Perhaps invention, is equivalent to the rediscovery of an existing concept* that no one had seen before.
144.author: artemiou

145.quote: Music, is the cradle of psycho-emotional well-being and spiritual growth.
145.author: artemiou

146.quote: A painting, is a message with colors.
146.author: artemiou

147.quote: Under certain frequencies, objects tend to operate, according to wave functions.
147.author: artemiou

148.quote: If you do not engage in recording and questioning the acquired knowledge, you undermine your understanding of it.
148.author: artemiou

149.quote: Fractals, project a mathematical world of infinite physical beauty.
149.author: artemiou

150.quote: Spiritual presence, does not imply the existence of physical.
150.author: artemiou

151.quote: Putting all the pieces of a missing puzzle together, is difficult. However, given the probability of finding each piece, the discovery of only a few of them, can reveal its entirety.
151.author: artemiou

152.quote: A disjointed battle, leads to a resounding defeat.
152.author: artemiou

153.quote: It is very difficult to predict every outcome of an unknown event* even if you are the creator.
153.author: artemiou

154.quote: When one is in love, the mind works irrationally.
154.author: artemiou

155.quote: The unknown, hides an attractive glamour* that captivates human curiosity.
155.author: artemiou

156.quote: Your brain, works like a muscle. If you do not exercise it, it atrophies.
156.author: artemiou

157.quote: Where there is measurement, there is Geometry.
157.author: artemiou

158.quote: The human brain, is a gift of endless surprises.
158.author: artemiou

159.quote: Questions, are the compass, that leads to the island of lost answers.
159.author: artemiou

160.quote: Illusions, are the proof, that our minds distort the truth.
160.author: artemiou

161.quote: Learning begins, where mental passivity ends.
161.author: artemiou

162.quote: Much of reality, lies in our minds.
162.author: artemiou

163.quote: Pain, can not be eliminated. It can only be shrunk.
163.author: artemiou

164.quote: Forgiveness, cleanses the soul and restores or strengthens the spiritual connection, between two individuals.
164.author: artemiou

165.quote: Perhaps, the world obeys the divisibility of particles. Perhaps, it is simultaneously connected - invisibly - to multiple sub-worlds, each governed by a different subset of laws, yet inextricably linked to a universal superset.
165.author: artemiou

166.quote: Devotion, is the ultimate form of focus.
166.author: artemiou

167.quote: Parkour, is the art of escape.
167.author: artemiou

168.quote: Love, is like a burning star. It lands with dizzying speed on the land of heart* igniting every emotion, that resides near the point of impact.
168.author: artemiou

169.quote: Our world, is structured by a tunnel of infinite sets.
169.author: artemiou

170.quote: Society, is structured upon hierarchies, in order to reduce injustices.
170.author: artemiou

171.quote: Changing the arrangement of the elements of a set, does not affect its essence. Therefore, the possible reluctance to reconfigure it, is useless.
171.author: artemiou

172.quote: What we call randomness, is a cosmic structure* that we are unable to perceive.
172.author: artemiou

173.quote: Programming, is the map of digital travelers.
173.author: artemiou

174.quote: The world, is a wonderful painting, coloured with the brush of love and inspired by a remarkable and mysterious artist. We are just that, the colorful dots, looking for their creator.
174.author: artemiou

175.quote: Self-learning, is the highest learning principle.
175.author: artemiou

176.quote: In a world of intellectual apathy, the standard deviation from high intellect, is relatively accessible.
176.author: artemiou

178.quote: Criminality thrives, under the indulgence of society.
178.author: artemiou

179.quote: When the particle functions of love and time collide, time tends to zero and love tends to infinity.
179.author: artemiou

180.quote: My value is worthless, if it is not based on tangible innovation.
180.author: artemiou

181.quote: Sometimes, even the truth is not good enough, for a discernible hope to be reborn.
181.author: artemiou

182.quote: Frequent rearrangements, disrupt the balance of a program.
182.author: artemiou

183.quote: One impressive innovation, can outperform multiple contributions in foreign fields.
183.author: artemiou

184.quote: The digital simulation of the physical world, intensifies the possibility of reconstructing reality.
184.author: artemiou

185.quote: The spatial grid of cosmic patterns, permeates every dimension.
185.author: artemiou

186.quote: We classify the world into classes, for the essential or necessary prevalence of order.
186.author: artemiou

187.quote: The constant choice of different subjects, as a source of inspiration, leads inevitably to intellectual confusion. It is then, that the temporary preoccupation with a subset of these, is deemed necessary.
187.author: artemiou

188.quote: If school focuses on 'What', then each of us must focus on 'How'.
188.author: artemiou

189.quote: Learning, should be guided by abstract goals. For the need to fulfill them, illuminates the appropriate aspects of the learning maze.
189.author: artemiou

190.quote: Pressure, favours the development of noteworthy strategies and an unbridled character.
190.author: artemiou

191.quote: The higher the pressure, the more beautiful the reward.
191.author: artemiou

192.quote: The time should be proportional, to the social pace of evolution.
192.author: artemiou

193.quote: The law of successful social interaction, is based on intimacy.
193.author: artemiou

194.quote: Often, the intervention of an adjacent person is called for* in order to reshape our internal world.
194.author: artemiou

195.quote: The world belongs to those, who have a pure heart.
195.author: artemiou

196.quote: Martial arts, teach mental humility, spiritual self mastery and harmonious physical self expression.
196.author: artemiou

197.quote: The majority of mentally disturbed children, come from a dysfunctional family environment.
197.author: artemiou

198.quote: When a crime is properly commited, it leaves behind little to no evidence.
198.author: artemiou

199.quote: He who is sick at heart, is also sick at spirit.
199.author: artemiou

200.quote: There is no point in acting useless, when you can be useful.
200.author: artemiou

201.quote: True friendship, is the strongest bond of mutual respect.
201.author: artemiou

202.quote: To avoid making mistakes, is to avoid progress. Because mistakes, are the teachers of progress.
202.author: artemiou

203.quote: It's funny that people criticize others for an act, that they themselves, do unconsciously.
203.author: artemiou

204.quote: Like a computer, we are programmed for evolution* not war.
204.author: artemiou

205.quote: In wartime, remain calm. In peacetime, fight.
205.author: artemiou

206.quote: When you obey tyranny* you become a danger to your society.
206.author: artemiou

207.quote: The silence of night, is the most beautiful music, for restless minds.
207.author: artemiou

208.quote: True faith, is only visible through the eyes of a dog.
208.author: artemiou

210.quote: Any fool, may know* but only a wise man accepts, that he does not know.
210.author: artemiou

211.quote: Love everyone. Do not hurt anyone.
211.author: artemiou

212.quote: Usually, we think we are hurting our fellow human beings* when in fact, they are choosing to be hurt.
212.author: artemiou

213.quote: Surely life has a purpose. It does not matter what it is. But part of it, is the realization of your purpose.
213.author: artemiou

214.quote: It is very easy to be evil. The real difficulty, is to be nice.
214.author: artemiou

215.quote: Every day, is another opportunity to create something beautiful.
215.author: artemiou

216.quote: Stop letting the opinions of others, determine your path. They do not matter when you die* nor while you live.
216.author: artemiou

217.quote: It is the fate of every creator, to be alone. For in a crowd, thought wanders* while in solitude, the mind is concentrated.
217.author: artemiou

218.quote: Your thoughts, are like the weather. They change constantly, according to your feelings.
218.author: artemiou

219.quote: Every true king, was once a slave.
219.author: artemiou

220.quote: Sooner or later, we will go home. Sooner or later, we will return to the stars.
220.author: artemiou

221.quote: When you feel sad, look up to the universe. Its magic, will chase away your tears.
221.author: artemiou

222.quote: Do what you love today. Tomorrow, you may not exist.
222.author: artemiou

223.quote: It is better to write, than to say what you feel. People tend to hurt, more than they heal.
223.author: artemiou

224.quote: It is said, that time travel has not yet been discovered. But reading a book, disproves the claim.
224.author: artemiou

225.quote: For you, wondering if life is fair* ask first, if you are fair to yourself.
225.author: artemiou

226.quote: As long as there is justice, injustice will coexist. The question is, who will prevail.
226.author: artemiou

227.quote: Instead of looking in the straw, for the needle* try removing it first. Think differently.
227.author: artemiou

229.quote: Everyone can think the same, but not everyone thinks they can think differently. Change, therefore, is necessary* not hypothetical.
229.author: artemiou

230.quote: Man and woman, must be united* not divided. If the base is cloned, civilization will fall.
230.author: artemiou

231.quote: The surest way to predict someone's moves* is to have allies, with them.
231.author: artemiou

232.quote: Perhaps, true attractiveness, is not about sexuality* but about your ability to attract, good people around you.
232.author: artemiou

233.quote: In every age, people are deceived by the 'unquestionable' opinions of the many.
233.author: artemiou

234.quote: Embrace change, but do not forget the mores.
234.author: artemiou

235.quote: Controlled work, is the best thing you can do for yourself* while constant rest, the worst.
235.author: artemiou

236.quote: In a marriage, the woman is set free* while the man, is enslaved.
236.author: artemiou

237.quote: Observation and thought, are two aspects of the same act.
237.author: artemiou

238.quote: From a world of action, we have been relegated to a world of inaction.
238.author: artemiou

239.quote: Look at yourself, in the mirror. See if your reflection, is the person you really want to be.
239.author: artemiou

240.quote: Before you ask for forgiveness, forgive yourself first.
240.author: artemiou

241.quote: In a war zone, inaction is fatal.
241.author: artemiou

242.quote: A true warrior, smiles at everything, that brings him closer to death.
242.author: artemiou

243.quote: You think you are different, yet you do not act like it.
243.author: artemiou

244.quote: The only certainty, is that nothing is certain.
244.author: artemiou

245.quote: What I fought for, I might win. But for what I did not, I certainly lost.
245.author: artemiou

246.quote: Just because you think you can not, does not mean that no one else can.
246.author: artemiou

247.quote: Just as a bird, needs two wings to fly* so man, needs to values to fly: love and imagination.
247.author: artemiou

248.quote: You have to plan the creation of yourself, before society drags you, into the prison of mass.
248.author: artemiou

249.quote: It is better to be a prisoner of your imagination, than a prisoner of reality.
249.author: artemiou

250.quote: Never speak up, to question someone. Speak, to make them question themselves.
250.author: artemiou

251.quote: To become an intellectual thinker, must be a goal, for one who respects the essence of science.
251.author: artemiou

252.quote: The point is not to be less corrupt, without action* but to balance corruption, through justice.
252.author: artemiou

253.quote: If you want to learn about the world, invest in a book. If you want to learn about the future, invest in your creative mind.
253.author: artemiou

254.quote: All art, is based on cosmic Geometry.
254.author: artemiou

255.quote: If you consider the usefulness of computers, we use the numbers they produce* to interpret natural patterns, which are governed by numbers. What a wonderful loop.
255.author: artemiou

256.quote: And if you think, that everything is built by chance* you have not seen the greatness of yourself.
256.author: artemiou

257.quote: When a drop falls into the water, the impact is deflected by the waves. Similarly, you should deflect any action, that attempts to upset you.
257.author: artemiou

258.quote: Living with fear or courage, death will find you. The first choice, brings death closer* while the second, brings life.
258.author: artemiou

259.quote: True blindness, is seeing and pretending not to see.
259.author: artemiou

260.quote: If you lack the ability to do something, do not worry. Nature, has diversified you, with another equal ability.
260.author: artemiou

261.quote: 'Do you believe in God?''Whatever my answer may be, it will be meaningless, if my actions do not reflect my words.
261.author: artemiou

262.quote: Ignorance of an event, does not imply its non-existence.
262.author: artemiou

263.quote: A meaningful sentence, teaches more, than a lecture of unambiguous words.
263.author: artemiou

264.quote: The more we condemn, the less we know.
264.author: artemiou

265.quote: Faith, is akin to a blind journey, into the unknown.
265.author: artemiou

266.quote: Will and choice, are the masters of all actions.
266.author: artemiou

267.quote: A caterpillar, is born on the ground* but can die, by flying as a butterfly.
267.author: artemiou

268.quote: You are born different, but it is a matter of choice, to die different.
268.author: artemiou

269.quote: A lion, is never meant to live next to sheep. The same applies, to humans.
269.author: artemiou

270.quote: Just as leaves fall from a tree, at the slightest touch of wind* so do people let their dreams fall, at the slightest touch of despair.
270.author: artemiou

271.quote: Opinions, are like pictures. They are shaped, according to how we view them.
271.author: artemiou

272.quote: The universe, is full of mysteries. It looks like, an infinite puzzle.
272.author: artemiou

273.quote: Imagination, not knowledge, should rule in the heart of man.
273.author: artemiou

274.quote: For those who are alone, you have the souls of heaven - by your side.
274.author: artemiou

275.quote: In a heated conversation, keep yourself calm.
275.author: artemiou

276.quote: The night sky, is like a map of the galactic unknown.
276.author: artemiou

277.quote: Pain, is the building block of greatness.
277.author: artemiou

278.quote: It is a matter of choice, to stand for justice or injustice. Now, depending on your choice, you will have different - painful - results.
278.author: artemiou

279.quote: Love, is the greatest act you can do.
279.author: artemiou

280.quote: A person in love, can attempt anything for the person he loves.
280.author: artemiou

281.quote: Social prosperity, is not achieved by the predominance of the powerful over the powerless* but by the balance between them.
281.author: artemiou

282.quote: Fuel your heart, with love* and you will be able to travel any road.
282.author: artemiou

283.quote: You can read any existing book* and still be inexperienced.
283.author: artemiou

284.quote: The simplest way to discover your richness, is by observing nature.
284.author: artemiou

285.quote: One cannot think* unless one is free.
285.author: artemiou

286.quote: Some people hunt in packs* and some people hunt alone.
286.author: artemiou

287.quote: Shine like the stars* and see to it, that your radiance illuminates the world.
287.author: artemiou

288.quote: Music unlocks spiritual paths, that you can not even imagine.
288.author: artemiou

289.quote: The worst thing you can do to your enemy, is to forgive him.
289.author: artemiou

290.quote: Responsibility, is not for everyone. But it must be shared equally by all, so that we may live in a peaceful life.
290.author: artemiou

291.quote: If you want to fight me, meet me in hell.
291.author: artemiou

292.quote: Technology, was invented to help humanity* not to destroy it.
292.author: artemiou

293.quote: Let your tears, fall from your eyes. They will calm the fire of pain, that burns in your soul.
293.author: artemiou

294.quote: A hug, is a symbol of protection, love and understanding. It is a refuge, for every wounded person* and a gift, for every happy one.
294.author: artemiou

295.quote: Never let your love for someone, be warn away by jealousy.
295.author: artemiou

296.quote: Jealousy in a friendship, is a sign of hatred* while in love, it is a sign of fear.
296.author: artemiou

297.quote: First win the world* and then a woman.
297.author: artemiou

298.quote: Keep those who find your dreams funny, at a distance.
298.author: artemiou

299.quote: Imagine, if the atoms that make up our organism, acted like human societies. Then we would be devastated* and probably would not exist.
299.author: artemiou

300.quote: Betraying your friend once, is tantamount to betraying yourself, twice.
300.author: artemiou

301.quote: Souls, fall like comets - and crash into the soil of death.
301.author: artemiou

302.quote: Tame your urges, before you become a slave to them.
302.author: artemiou

303.quote: Prohibition, is a paraphrase of the violation of the law.
303.author: artemiou

304.quote: The only prayer we all need to say, is for everyone to be well* that love and peace will be established to our hearts* that we will give thanks for all that have* and above all, for the life we have been given.
304.author: artemiou

305.quote: Not trusting yourself, is poison to every aspect of your life.
305.author: artemiou

306.quote: Darkness, has this unique ability to let you die* before you are even born.
306.author: artemiou

307.quote: Caging an animal, is worse than letting it die free.
307.author: artemiou

308.quote: Some souls have this connection, which is strengthened, the further they are apart from each other.
308.author: artemiou

309.quote: Feeling, is the king. Thought, is the advisor. Action, is the servant.
309.author: artemiou

310.quote: Murder, is an act of cowardice or desperation.
310.author: artemiou

311.quote: For a serial killer, torture and death - as punishments - are just a fun game* but for society, it is a gift of salvation.
311.author: artemiou

312.quote: Those who have no feelings and see everyone as mere objects* are not human.
312.author: artemiou

313.quote: The only difficulty, that all kind people face* is that they are destined to suffer more.
313.author: artemiou

314.quote: The body, is full of atoms* as nature, is full of shapes and notes* as numbers, are full of infinity.
314.author: artemiou

315.quote: The equation of creation, is interpreted as follows: God or love equals life.
315.author: artemiou

316.quote: You hold the pen of creation and understanding.
316.author: artemiou

317.quote: Emotion and logic, must exist in harmony.
317.author: artemiou

318.quote: Unnecessary words, in a sentence* are like adding water, to  a full jar.
318.author: artemiou

319.quote: The essence of life, is your essence.
319.author: artemiou

320.quote: There is an oasis, in everyone's desert.
320.author: artemiou

321.quote: Where there is love, there is life.
321.author: artemiou

322.quote: Advice is good, for those who want to listen it.
322.author: artemiou

323.quote: Do not push away, those who make you a better person.
323.author: artemiou

324.quote: As a prisoner, you have to find a way to escape from the cell. Only then, you will be free.
324.author: artemiou

325.quote: The age of miracles will come, when there is faith.
325.author: artemiou

326.quote: Confess your sins, so that your soul may be healed.
326.author: artemiou

328.quote: Those who deserve your trust, are the ones who would die for you.
328.author: artemiou

329.quote: When one's life is threatened* many things become possible.
329.author: artemiou

330.quote: Our world is made in such a way, that justice cannot prevail, without being stained with blood.
330.author: artemiou

331.quote: I have known many pains* but none surpasses the parting of a loved one.
331.author: artemiou

332.quote: For the strong, are made to endure* and the weak, to escape.
332.author: artemiou

333.quote: Every generation, is an imitation of the previous one. The only difference, lies in the mind.
333.author: artemiou

334.quote: How many people have suffered, for us to live? That question alone should bring you purpose, if you do not have one* or courage to move on, when purpose exists.
334.author: artemiou

335.quote: Talent, is when love and perseverance, merge.
335.author: artemiou

336.quote: What we see around us, is made up of shapes* and what we feel, is made up of numbers.
336.author: artemiou

337.quote: We live in a world, where knowledge is praised over imagination* ignoring the fact that knowledge, is a timeless product of imagination.
337.author: artemiou

338.quote: Choose wisely. For it is the only way, to achieve your goal.
338.author: artemiou

339.quote: If in life, you do not want to be different* it is inglorious, to try to offer something to the world.
339.author: artemiou

340.quote: Justice, belongs to those who in times of defeat* still aim for a better world.
340.author: artemiou

341.quote: Perhaps failure, is simply a paraphrase of 'I am not trying'. Perhaps, it is another way of saying 'I admit defeat.'. Perhaps it is an illusion that tries to scare the mind away, from accepting its true potential.
341.author: artemiou

342.quote: Do not let the fear of death, weaken you. Use it as motivation, on the path of life.
342.author: artemiou

343.quote: Pen is a sword, that can only be sharpened by imagination.
343.author: artemiou

344.quote: Life, is like chess. One wrong move* and you lose.
344.author: artemiou

345.quote: If you want to understand the world* be willing to understand yourself, first.
345.author: artemiou

346.quote: There is no reason to worry about the past or the future. Because both of these dimensions, are determined by the present.
346.author: artemiou

348.quote: Try and you may fail. Do not try and you will not succeed.
348.author: artemiou

349.quote: Have faith, even when all hope seems lost.
349.author: artemiou

350.quote: It is loyalty that counts* not promise.
350.author: artemiou

351.quote: Be fluid, like water* silent, like air* bright, like the sun* and enigmatic, like nature.
351.author: artemiou

352.quote: The best defense, is hard practice.
352.author: artemiou

353.quote: Symmetry, is the love of eyes.
353.author: artemiou

354.quote: Your choices, are like atoms* they shape the world.
354.author: artemiou

355.quote: We are explorers, in the endless sea of imagination.
355.author: artemiou

356.quote: It is harder to invent an idea* than to adopt another.
356.author: artemiou

357.quote: Love, is a form of generosity.
357.author: artemiou

358.quote: Science, is the highest form of art.
358.author: artemiou

359.quote: There is something worse than death. To see the world being destroyed* and not act.
359.author: artemiou

360.quote: Live as a slave and die as a slave. Live as a soldier and die as a hero.
360.author: artemiou

361.quote: Thoughts, are like waves. They recede.
361.author: artemiou

362.quote: Where music is missing, pain flourishes.
362.author: artemiou

363.quote: The majority, often believe that they think. In reality, however, they only imitate.
363.author: artemiou

365.quote: Aim for the sky. Start from the ground.
365.author: artemiou

366.quote: Every great man, is a philosopher.
366.author: artemiou

367.quote: Do not fight yourself. Be his friend.
367.author: artemiou

368.quote: Do not dare to blame, when you have the choice to act rightly.
368.author: artemiou

369.quote: Imagine yourself, in a world full of love. Then give everything, to bring that love into the world.
369.author: artemiou

371.quote: It is not the blade of the knife, that hurts you* but the fear of using it, that wounds you.
371.author: artemiou

372.quote: In the face of good* evil lies, blames, misbehaves.
372.author: artemiou

373.quote: The opaque colors, give diversity* while the aesthetic ones, add order, beauty, elegance.
373.author: artemiou

374.quote: Even when you are isolated, you are not alone.
374.author: artemiou

375.quote: The world, is a convolution of the dimensions of light and darkness.
375.author: artemiou

376.quote: The more we take things around us for granted, the more we disarm ourselves, of our ability to discern* the impossible from the possible.
376.author: artemiou

377.quote: The worst betrayal of your life, is suicide.
377.author: artemiou

378.quote: If the existence of the world had no cause* there would be no living life.
378.author: artemiou

379.quote: The pursuit of beauty is necessary, in order for man to escape from insanity.
379.author: artemiou

380.quote: Boredom, is a way for the mind to escape, from the bustling reality.
380.author: artemiou

381.quote: A great truth, is built up from smaller ones* and when revealed, it illuminates the world around it.
381.author: artemiou

382.quote: Politics, is the science that deals* with the regulation of society.
382.author: artemiou

383.quote: The association of seemingly unconnected things, reveals a global abstract order.
383.author: artemiou

384.quote: Life, is the gift, we all receive* but few of us enjoy.
384.author: artemiou

385.quote: Anger, is the fighting enemy of reason.
385.author: artemiou

386.quote: I thought I was brave, until I started to act.
386.author: artemiou

387.quote: The gift, of conscientious offering, heals our existential instability.
387.author: artemiou

388.quote: If you seek your faults, ask your enemy.
388.author: artemiou

389.quote: Everyone has knowledge, but few possess it.
389.author: artemiou

390.quote: Laughter, is the most beautiful endemic disease.
390.author: artemiou

391.quote: Learn to distinguish, good from evil* and even more so, the light in the darkness.
391.author: artemiou

392.quote: Time, is the oxygen that man needs, in order to breathe in eternal life.
392.author: artemiou

393.quote: The pursuit of personal growth, is one of the fundamental vital functions of the soul.
393.author: artemiou

394.quote: The optimal solution of a problem* lies in a higher dimension.
394.author: artemiou

395.quote: The deification of inanimate objects, corrupts true faith.
395.author: artemiou

396.quote: The spread of negative emotions, is identical to that of the diseases.
396.author: artemiou

397.quote: Luck, is the difference between two sets: the problems to solve, and the actions to tackle them.
397.author: artemiou

398.quote: In order to share, you must first acquire.
398.author: artemiou

399.quote: An effective way to shrink a negative situation* is to increase the proportion of people, available to fight it.
399.author: artemiou

400.quote: In life, we invest wrongly in the soul. And when we face the right source of energy, we retreat in defiance of its power.
400.author: artemiou

401.quote: The loss of a loved one, is equivalent to the inactivation of a part of the well regulated mental well being.
401.author: artemiou

402.quote: Learn to be grateful, every day of your life* to have a peaceful and honest breath.
402.author: artemiou

403.quote: The best gift you can offer your beloved ones, is your presence.
403.author: artemiou

404.quote: Material wealth, is generated, blossoms and dies* while spiritual wealth, is born, lives and breathes.
404.author: artemiou

405.quote: If you have not yet discovered the passion of life* then start the journey, before the sun sets.
405.author: artemiou

406.quote: Emotion, is the only currency that is not susceptible to deterioration* because it does not obey the malleability of reason.
406.author: artemiou

407.quote: You have within you, everything you need to acquire* and by honest action, the gifts of the soul to conquer.
407.author: artemiou

408.quote: Greatness, is shaped by faith, action and dignity.
408.author: artemiou

409.quote: If you wish to change the equation of the world* start from its variables before you carve the view.
409.author: artemiou

410.quote: The value of every living breath* is the divine offering, at the pinnacle of life.
410.author: artemiou

411.quote: In a world, where heroism and bravery have been lost* be the cause of the resurrection of ideas, that have been eroded.
411.author: artemiou

412.quote: The sign of the energy, that your life deposits* is the weight of the choices, that your action makes up.
412.author: artemiou

413.quote: It is said, that eros and love, have a heterotic time* but they are concepts of the same kind, whose superposition causes the difference.
413.author: artemiou

414.quote: Destiny, is an unparallel segment, with given edges* an unwritten book, longing to be raised by a pen.
414.author: artemiou

415.quote: The correct approach of arithmosophy* unveils the secrets, of universal symmetry.
415.author: artemiou

416.quote: The totality of universal knowledge* can be traced back to the arithmosophy, of the greek language.
416.author: artemiou

417.quote: The ideological conflict, that plagues the modern age* is due to man's alienation, from the Supreme Authority.
417.author: artemiou

418.quote: Man, is born to reshape life* while woman is born, to create a virtuous breath.
418.author: artemiou

419.quote: When a loved one, is gone from your life* then you will understand their value, directly to your soul.
419.author: artemiou

420.quote: It is wonderful when someone you love, shares their soul with you* giving you secrets, hidden in their chest of silence.
420.author: artemiou

421.quote: The eloquent melodies of music* promote the three-dimensional structure, to the highest harmonic sequences.
421.author: artemiou

422.quote: True friendship, in human life* is the joint contribution, that renews the current flow.
422.author: artemiou

423.quote: A person's value at a point in time* is the average of the choices, that got him there.
423.author: artemiou

424.quote: The vow of life, is special, unique* it is the virtues that guide man, towards the eternal gate of life.
424.author: artemiou

425.quote: The more I pursue the truth* the more my soul is attracted, to one and only one God.
425.author: artemiou

426.quote: If you ask to revive yourself* then embrace values, that will make you flourish.
426.author: artemiou

427.quote: The negative response to our past mistakes* brings a similar invocation to our future burdens.
427.author: artemiou

428.quote: If you are waiting for the ideal conditions to begin* then the battle is lost, before you start.
428.author: artemiou

429.quote: If you really want to give meaning to your life* take on responsibilities, beyond your status.
429.author: artemiou

430.quote: Our detachment, from modern paranoia* is necessary, for the path to intellect.
430.author: artemiou

431.quote: There is a linear relativity* in the time aspects, that define perceived reality.
431.author: artemiou

432.quote: The only certainty, is the uncertainty of the existential cause.
432.author: artemiou

433.quote: The differentiation between the victors and the defeated, does not lie in the final goal* but in the strategy of implementation towards it.
433.author: artemiou

434.quote: Generalized intelligence, is superior to specialized intelligence.
434.author: artemiou

435.quote: Hyperanalysis, is not always fatal* since it eliminates extreme logical errors.
435.author: artemiou

436.quote: Human genius, is the spiritual epicenter, delineate by our psychic genius.
436.author: artemiou

437.quote: Substatic self-mastery, is shaped by our inherent discipline.
437.author: artemiou

438.quote: Writing, is the way, that the heart attempts to express itself.
438.author: artemiou

439.quote: The military, must teach discipline* by fostering values and morals, that promote education.
439.author: artemiou

440.quote: Life is wonderful, as long as you see its joys* bear its sorrows and overcome its changes.
440.author: artemiou

441.quote: Your first love, let it be an idea* for it is an eternal, fatal aspect of life.
441.author: artemiou

442.quote: The souls that are united, by their mutual faith* are both trapped, in their love bladder.
442.author: artemiou

443.quote: Man, is easily carried away by himself* betraying both his dream and Creator.
443.author: artemiou

444.quote: The only way to keep a relationship* is for the couple's heart, to live inside the habit of love.
444.author: artemiou

445.quote: The informational organization, of ideological cosmology* deconstructs the spectrum, of mental paralogy.
445.author: artemiou

446.quote: No one will understand you more than yourself* because he is your only friend and your fellow man.
446.author: artemiou

447.quote: I have the power to change you, if you let me* give me the key to your heart and appreciate me.
447.author: artemiou
